mapper.insert: insert into attraction_info(type_code, name, address, latitude, longitude, description, img) values(#{attractionType.typeCode}, #{name}, #{address}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{description}, #{img.saveFile})
mapper.select:
select * from attraction_info a join attraction_type b on a.type_code = b.type_code
order by (6371*acos(cos(radians(${latitude}))*cos(radians(latitude))*cos(radians(longitude) -radians(${longitude}))+sin(radians(${latitude}))*sin(radians(latitude)))) limit ${start}, ${countPerPage}
select * from attraction_info a join attraction_type b on a.type_code = b.type_code where a.attraction_key = #{attractionKey}
mapper.update: update attraction_info set name = #{name}, address = #{address}, latitude = #{latitude}, longitude=#{longitude}, description=#{description}, img=#{img.saveFile} where attraction_key=#{attractionKey}
mapper.delete: delete from user_like_attraction where user_id= #{userId} and attraction_key= #{attractionKey}
